name: Jaguar
description: The Jaguar is a powerful big cat with a spotted coat, known for its strength and stealth.
food_note: Ambush predator with a strong bite, capable of crushing skulls.
proportions: Length: 1.1-1.9 m, height: 60-75 cm, weight: 50-120 kg.
reproduction: Gestation about 100 days, litters of 1-4 cubs.
attractions: Major attraction in zoos due to their beauty and power.
projects_note: Threatened by habitat loss and poaching; conservation programs are active.
breeding: Bred in captivity to support population recovery.
